title: iPhone 15 Pro Review: The Good, The Bad, & The Ugly!
description: iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max are refinements of last year's already refined phones.  Get $300 off the Pod Cover with code MKBHD until Cyber Monday at   JerryRigEverything durability test:  Dave2D gaming:   The Not boring weather app:   MKBHD Merch:   Tech I'm using right now:   Intro Track:  Playlist of MKBHD Intro music:   Phone provided by Apple for review.  0:00 Intro 3:11 The Build 5:00 USB-C 7:24 A17 Pro 10:00 Battery and Overheating 12:31 Actually Pro Cameras 20:38 Action Button 22:38 Eight Sleep (Sponsor) 23:48 The Verdict  ~
